MODULE.name: VOICE_MODULE_DTMF_DETECTION
MODULE.description:
DTMF detection algorithm in the voice#[ #] postprocessor on the Rx path.
This module supports the following parameter IDs
VOICE_PARAM_MOD_ENABLE
VOICE_PARAM_DTMF_DETECTION

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Enable
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Enables/disables this feature

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Reserved
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Client should set this field to zero.

PARAMETER.name: VOICE_PARAM_DTMF_DETECTION
PARAMETER.description:
DTMF detection algorithm.
Fixed size for this parameter
Version#[ #] 0 – 36 bytes

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: MagnitudeThresh
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Tx DTMF#[ #] detection magnitude threshold. This corresponds to a minimum energy level of -29 dBm in each of the two tones in the input signal. On the Rx side,#[ #] a lesser nominal value is suggested, as the DTMF detection is carried out on the output of the decoder.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: FwTwistFactor
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Tx DTMF#[ #] detection forward twist factor. Used when the energy in the highest-magnitude tone in Band 1 has a higher energy than the highest-magnitude tone#[ #] in Band 2.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: RevTwistFactor
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Tx DTMF#[ #] detection reverse twist factor. Used when the energy in the highest-magnitude tone in Band 2 has a higher energy than the highest-magnitude tone#[ #] in Band 1.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: FreqRatio1
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Tx DTMF detection#[ #] maximum ratio between two frequencies in the same band

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: FreqRatio2
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Tx DTMF detection#[ #] maximum ratio between two frequencies in the same band

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: FreqRatio3
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Tx DTMF detection#[ #] maximum ratio between two frequencies in the same band

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: FreqRatio4
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Tx DTMF detection#[ #] maximum ratio between two frequencies in the same band

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: FreqRatio5
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Tx DTMF detection#[ #] maximum ratio between two frequencies in the same band

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: FreqRatio6
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Tx DTMF#[ #] detection maximum ratio between two frequencies in the same band

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: FreqRatio7
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Tx DTMF#[ #] detection maximum ratio between two frequencies in the same band

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: FreqRatio8
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Tx DTMF#[ #] detection maximum ratio between two frequencies in the same band

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: DetectionThresh1
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Tx DTMF#[ #] detection Threshold1. Used in the energy ratio test for band 1. This parameter is a Q15 unsigned number.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: DetectionThresh2
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Tx DTMF#[ #] detection Threshold2. Used in the energy ratio test for band 2. This parameter is a Q15 unsigned number.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: DetectionThresh31
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Threshold31, used in an energy ratio test.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: DetectionThresh32
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Threshold32, used in an energy ratio test

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: ParamL
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: To do

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: ParamM
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: To do

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: ParamN
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: To do

MODULE.name: VOICE_MODULE_TX_DTMF_DETECTION
MODULE.description:
DTMF detection algorithm in the voice#[ #] postprocessor on the Tx path.
This module supports the following parameter IDs 
VOICE_PARAM_MOD_ENABLE
VOICE_PARAM_DTMF_DETECTION

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Enable
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Enables/disables this feature

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: Reserved
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Client should set this field to zero.

PARAMETER.name: VOICE_PARAM_DTMF_DETECTION
PARAMETER.description:
DTMF detection algorithm.
Fixed size for this parameter
Version#[ #] 0 – 36 bytes

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: MagnitudeThresh
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Tx DTMF#[ #] detection magnitude threshold. This corresponds to a minimum energy level of -29 dBm in each of the two tones in the input signal. On the Rx side,#[ #] a lesser nominal value is suggested, as the DTMF detection is carried out on the output of the decoder.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: FwTwistFactor
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Tx DTMF#[ #] detection forward twist factor. Used when the energy in the highest-magnitude tone in Band 1 has a higher energy than the highest-magnitude tone#[ #] in Band 2.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: RevTwistFactor
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Tx DTMF#[ #] detection reverse twist factor. Used when the energy in the highest-magnitude tone in Band 2 has a higher energy than the highest-magnitude tone#[ #] in Band 1.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: FreqRatio1

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: FreqRatio8
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Tx DTMF#[ #] detection maximum ratio between two frequencies in the same band

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: DetectionThresh1
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Tx DTMF#[ #] detection Threshold1. Used in the energy ratio test for band 1. This parameter is a Q15 unsigned number.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.name: DetectionThresh2
CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Tx DTMF#[ #] detection Threshold2. Used in the energy ratio test for band 2. This parameter is a Q15 unsigned number.

CONFIG_ELEMENT.description: Threshold31, used in an energy ratio test.
